description.narrative: By 2020 National Early Childhood Development Strategy and Action plan operational, which contributes to Early Childhood Development, Early Learning, Learning Outcomes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020 families' resilience and coping mechanisms are strengthened and parents know about the importance of the early years

participating-org.narrative: BELARUSIAN STATE PEDAGOGICAL UNIVER EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION
REPUBLICAN CLINICAL CENTER OF PALLIATIVE MEDICAL CARE TO CHILDREN

mailing-address.narrative: 22A Krasnoarmejskaya Street 220030 Minsk Republic of Belarus

sector.narrative: Capacity development of ECD frontline workers
ECD data, evidence, and knowledge generation and dissemination
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
System strengthening - early learning / pre-primary policy, leadership, and budget

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020 National Early Childhood Development Strategy and Action plan operational

description.narrative: In collaboration with the MoE and MoH, the CO continued to play a convening role to promote an equity focus on early childhood development and early learning, providing technical assistance to strengthen the quality of ECE and support system to parents, especially most vulnerable. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:17/12/2019

title.narrative: National ECD and early learning strategy exists

actual.value: 2019:ECD Strategy has been drafted by the international consultant and submitted to MoE for further discussion on the process of the drafting of a normative ducument. Working groyup of national experts will be established to finalize the ECD Strategy draft in 2020.
